The expert: s verdict highlights that U.S. Sen. Marco Rubio's stance on abortion for pregnant women with Zika was misrepresented in a campaign ad by U.S. Rep. Patrick Murphy.
The ad uses a prior Murphy campaign ad i: Marco Rubio: 'No abortions for Zika-infected women.'" This image is then shown with a stamped "FALSE" to discredit the claim.
